page.title: 04Housing.New Estate.
page.content: New Housing Estate in Newport. Six years ago,it was decided to build a second housing development in Newport.A grass field that was used to graze cattle in and in which the local village agricultural show was held annually,was sold for building a new estate.The roads in the estate are named in a country tradition,such as,Black Thorn Close and Meadow Lane.Some of the houses are detatched but most are semi-detatched. Already foundations are being dug in the field adjoining to extend the housing development further.At the moment there are about seventy houses on this estate. This estate is built at the eastern end of the village.It is built between the A63 which runs through the village and the M62.The motorway traffic can be heard but not seen. Tiffany Reed.
